channel.title: Beta Testing
channel.description:
Hey guys. I haven't been active in a while but I've come back working on a Runescape Private Server related project. I just have a few enquiries!
Firstly, if I wish to recruit a group of people to do beta testing on my project until I am happy with the product and happy to put online, would I be able to recruit on the Moparscape forums somehow? I know there is a Development Team section, however I'm not too sure if that applies to what I'm looking for.
Secondly, I wish to make it a sponsered server when it is ready. This question is more to Mopar himself. I would like it to be sponsered the moment it is ready, however I am aware of the bidding process and I know that it may take time, especially considering I am not aware of the current bids. I was looking for an amount I could bid, which would just get me within the sponsered server bracket. I am willing to pay, I just wish to know the current bids if possible.
Thanks for reading guys. Greatly appreciated.

item.title: Beta Testing
item.dc:creator: @Scarecrows Scarecrows
item.description:
@Scarecrows wrote:

Oh really? I will keep that in mind.

And thank you very much.

Read full topic

item.title: Beta Testing
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

You can however post a link to your website (if you have one). Having a link on your topic to a downloadable or playable web client that can connect to your beta server is not allowed however.

That’s not to say that on your website you can’t have a link to the client so people can play, etc.

Also, welcome back

Read full topic

item.title: Beta Testing
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

just post a topic in the server development section asking people different areas to test, remember that blatant advertising is not tolerated.

Read full topic

item.title: Beta Testing
item.dc:creator: @Scarecrows Scarecrows
item.description:
@Scarecrows wrote:

Oh really? I haven’t been active in a LONG time. I should have read around first eh?

Any idea of the Beta recruitment?

Read full topic

item.title: Beta Testing
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

If you get your server approved by posting the details in the proper section, you can see the bidding information (including current bids) at any time

Read full topic
